explanation: [0-0] In a shopping mall, a young man and a young woman, both wearing white tops, are sitting on a bright green bench. The woman has long brown hair and is leaning on the man to her left, her left arm resting on his shoulder. They both face forward. A young woman with long black hair wearing black pants is squatting behind them, eyes closed and mouth smiling, her left index finger placed between her nose. There are several shop windows in the background, and the subtitle "Tik Tok" is displayed in the middle of the screen.

[0-10] The young woman in black pants, squatting behind, pats the arm of the woman in the white top. The woman in white turns her head to the left, looking at the woman in black pants, who puts her index finger to her nose, making a "hush" gesture. Then she reaches out and puts her hand on the hand of the woman in white, moving it down. The woman in black pants then puts her hand on the left shoulder of the man in the white top and smiles happily. Then the scene switches, the man and woman in white tops are sitting on a green sofa, both holding mobile phones in their right hands, talking to each other. Then the man picks up his phone and looks at it. At this time, the woman in black pants behind the green sofa puts her right hand on the shoulder of the man in the white top, covering her mouth with her left hand and laughing secretly.

[18-24] The woman in white sitting next to him on the sofa slowly moves back until there is a large distance between them. Then she waves to the man.
